This figure shows time-series data for Monthly Pacific Decadal Oscillation Index (y-axis, PDO) from 1981 to 2020 (x-axis, Year). The mean of the full time series was 0.31 (lower standard deviation = -0.75, upper standard deviation = 1.37). The index was more than one standard deviation above the mean of the full time series in 1981, 1981, 1981, 1981, 1983, 1983, 1983, 1983, 1983, 1983, 1983, 1984, 1984, 1984, 1986, 1986, 1986, 1986, 1986, 1986, 1987, 1987, 1987, 1987, 1987, 1987, 1987, 1987, 1987, 1988, 1992, 1992, 1992, 1993, 1993, 1993, 1993, 1993, 1993, 1995, 1995, 1996, 1996, 1997, 1997, 1997, 1997, 1997, 1997, 1998, 1998, 2002, 2002, 2003, 2003, 2003, 2005, 2014, 2014, 2014, 2014, 2015, 2015, 2015, 2015, 2015, 2015, 2015, 2015, 2015, 2016, 2016, 2016, 2016, 2016, 2016 and 2016. The index was more than one standard deviation below the mean of the full time series in 1982, 1989, 1989, 1989, 1990, 1990, 1991, 1991, 1991, 1991, 1994, 1994, 1994, 1994, 1994, 1998, 1998, 1999, 1999, 1999, 1999, 1999, 1999, 2000, 2000, 2000, 2000, 2000, 2001, 2001, 2001, 2001, 2001, 2001, 2005, 2005, 2006, 2007, 2007, 2008, 2008, 2008, 2008, 2008, 2008, 2008, 2008, 2008, 2008, 2008, 2009, 2009, 2009, 2009, 2009, 2010, 2010, 2010, 2010, 2010, 2010, 2011, 2011, 2011, 2011, 2011, 2011, 2011, 2011, 2012, 2012, 2012, 2012, 2012, 2012, 2012, 2012, 2012, 2013, 2013, 2013, 2013, 2020, 2020 and 2020. The index was -0.9 in 2020, the most recent year of the time series.
